member.name: T:RiptideNetworking.ActionQueue
member.summary: Provides functionality for queueing methods for later execution from a chosen thread.

member.summary: The name to use when logging messages via .

member.summary: Handles initial setup.
member.param: The name to use when logging messages via .

member.summary: Adds an action to the queue.
member.param: The action to be added to the queue.

member.name: M:RiptideNetworking.ActionQueue.ExecuteAll
member.summary: Executes all actions in the queue on the calling thread.

member.name: T:RiptideNetworking.Client
member.summary: Represents a client connection.

member.name: P:RiptideNetworking.Client.Id
member.summary: The numeric ID.

member.name: P:RiptideNetworking.Client.RTT
member.summary: The round trip time of the connection. -1 if not calculated yet.

member.name: P:RiptideNetworking.Client.SmoothRTT
member.summary: The smoothed round trip time of the connection. -1 if not calculated yet.

member.name: P:RiptideNetworking.Client.IsConnecting
member.summary: Whether or not the client is currently in the process of connecting.

member.name: P:RiptideNetworking.Client.IsConnected
member.summary: Whether or not the client is currently connected.

member.name: P:RiptideNetworking.Client.TimeoutTime
member.summary: The time (in milliseconds) after which to disconnect if there's no heartbeat from the server.

member.name: P:RiptideNetworking.Client.HeartbeatInterval
member.summary: The interval (in milliseconds) at which heartbeats are to be expected from clients.

member.name: F:RiptideNetworking.Client.receiveActionQueue
member.summary: The action queue to use when invoking events. if events should be invoked immediately.

member.name: F:RiptideNetworking.Client.remoteEndPoint
member.summary: The connection's remote endpoint.

member.name: F:RiptideNetworking.Client.rudp
member.summary: The client's Rudp instance.

member.name: F:RiptideNetworking.Client.connectionState
member.summary: The client's current connection state.

member.name: F:RiptideNetworking.Client.connectionAttempts
member.summary: How many connection attempts have been made.

member.name: F:RiptideNetworking.Client.maxConnectionAttempts
member.summary: How many connection attempts to make before giving up.

member.name: P:RiptideNetworking.Client.HasTimedOut
member.summary: Whether or not the client has timed out.

member.name: F:RiptideNetworking.Client.heartbeatTimer
member.summary: The timer responsible for sending regular heartbeats.

member.name: F:RiptideNetworking.Client.lastHeartbeat
member.summary: The time at which the last heartbeat was received from the client.

member.name: F:RiptideNetworking.Client.heartbeatMessage
member.summary: A unique reusable message for sending heartbeats to avoid threading issues.

member.name: F:RiptideNetworking.Client.lastPingId
member.summary: ID of the last ping that was sent.

member.name: F:RiptideNetworking.Client.pendingPing
member.summary: The currently pending ping.

member.name: M:RiptideNetworking.Client.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Handles initial setup.
member.param: The name to use when logging messages via .

member.name: M:RiptideNetworking.Client.Connect(System.String,System.UInt16,RiptideNetworking.ActionQueue,System.UInt16,System.Byte)
member.summary: Attempts to connect to an IP and port.
member.param: The IP to connect to.
The remote port to connect to.
The action queue to add messages to. Passing will cause messages to be handled immediately on the same thread on which they were received.
The interval (in milliseconds) at which heartbeats should be sent to the server.
How many connection attempts to make before giving up.

member.name: M:RiptideNetworking.Client.Heartbeat(System.Object)
member.summary: Sends a connnect or heartbeat message. Called by .

member.name: M:RiptideNetworking.Client.ShouldHandleMessageFrom(System.Net.IPEndPoint,System.Byte)
member.summary: Determines whether or not to handle a message from a specific remote endpoint.
member.param: The endpoint from which the message was sent.
The first byte of the message.
member.returns: if the message should be handled.

member.name: M:RiptideNetworking.Client.Handle(System.Byte[],System.Net.IPEndPoint,RiptideNetworking.HeaderType)
member.summary: Handles the given data.
member.param: The data to handle.
The endpoint from which the data was received.
The header type of the data.

member.name: M:RiptideNetworking.Client.ReliableHandle(System.Byte[],System.Net.IPEndPoint,RiptideNetworking.HeaderType)
member.summary: Handles the given reliably sent data.
member.param: The reliably sent data.
The endpoint from which the data was received.
The header type of the data.

member.summary: Sends a message to the server.

How often to try sending a reliable message before giving up.

member.name: T:RiptideNetworking.SendLockables
member.summary: Contains values that are accessed by multiple threads and are used to inform the other end of which messages we've received.

member.name: F:RiptideNetworking.SendLockables.LastReceivedSeqId
member.summary: The sequence ID of the latest message that we want to acknowledge.

member.name: F:RiptideNetworking.SendLockables.AcksBitfield
member.summary: Messages that we have received and want to acknowledge.

member.name: T:RiptideNetworking.ReceiveLockables
member.summary: Contains values that are accessed by multiple threads and are used to determine which messages the other end has received.

member.name: F:RiptideNetworking.ReceiveLockables.LastAckedSeqId
member.summary: The sequence ID of the latest message that we've received an ack for.

member.name: F:RiptideNetworking.ReceiveLockables.AckedMessagesBitfield
member.summary: Messages that we sent which have been acknoweledged.
